title: About BEARS
text:
Who are we?
We are the Berlin Experimental Astronautics Research Student Team e.V. a newly founded student association at the Technische Universität Berlin. Our club was founded on the 31th of May 2022 with the goal to provide students from all the discplines the opportunity to apply their theoretical knwoledege in practical space related projects.

title: New Website for BEARS
text:
What’s new?

New design
Blog posts
Scientific writing with Quarto


Examples
This is the Tsiolkovsky rocket equation:1
\[\Delta v = v_e \ln\frac{m_0}{m_f}\]
For example, for the upper stage of starship, the \(\Delta v\) in dependence on the mass of the rocket is:


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

mf = 1200  # fuel mass in t
ms = 120  # dry mass in t
mp = np.linspace(0, 150)  # payload mass in t
m0 = mf + ms + mp  # total mass in t
ve = 3560  # exhaust velocity in m/s
dv = ve * np.log(m0 / (ms + mp))  # delta v in m/s

plt.plot(mp, dv)
plt.ylabel("$\Delta v$ [m/s]")
plt.xlabel("Payload mass [t]")
plt.show()

We are the Berlin Experimental Astronautics Research Student Team e.V. and working on space related projects in our free time. Our work is split up in three working groups:
Regardless of your academic background, if you are interested you can contact us via mail or on Instagram. Otherwise, you can join us in our weekly meeting at 6 pm in the F11 at the ILR.
